**Role:** As a [role]  
**Function:** I need [some function]  
**Business Value:** So that [some benefit]  
   
### Details and Assumptions
* [let developers know what we know]

### Acceptance Criteria  

```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [the outcome of action is observed]
```
